description: Governed roots definition for G0 gate. Files in these directories MUST be registered in file_ownership_registry.

notes.G0_behavior: G0 gate validates that every file in governed_roots exists in file_ownership_registry.csv
notes.external_files: Files outside governed_roots are not subject to G0 validation
notes.exclusions: Files matching excluded_patterns are skipped during validation
notes.derived_registries: These are rebuilt from ledger+manifests, not owned by packages. Excluded from baseline and G0B.
